data.text: @affinecionados @nzherald Sorry you can't read, back to school for you. You're boring me now. Goodbye
@affinecionados @nzherald I corrected myself earlier 100,000 cases a day in UK. Maybe pull your head in and learn to read.

@nzherald Hey you’re a balanced media personality. Any ideas what Mr Ardern is up to these days...? He’s lying low atm for some reason...I’m wondering why you good media haven’t been in contact with him lately to get his thoughts..?
@nzherald Question; over 24 hours later we still have no comment from ardern on the high court ruling. And no media has reported on what this means for her illegal mandates. Please tell me Why..?
@Upmysleeve007 @nzherald Actually, looking at London's cases, it appears that London never got close to 100,000 a day either. Are you a liar or just misinformed?

@Upmysleeve007 @nzherald One thing that London had against it though - in a population density of 5000 people per square km it spreads like wildfire. It's analogous to how sound travels faster through steel or water than it does through air.

@Upmysleeve007 @nzherald Very brave to make a call either way. But it makes much more sense to think of overall percentage of the overall population. NZ will exceed 1% of the overall population per day for sure.
@affinecionados @nzherald Tell me when it gets to 100,000. NZ won't come close.
@nzherald It's a shame that New Zealanders have to drag the Government through the court sytems to move forward on borders and mandates
@nzherald Labour. Xenophobic. Political tyrants. At least they're on top with Law and Order.
